name: Zambies 2
description:
Zambies 2 is a topdown shooter with 3 different "play as long as you can" maps, highscores, 8 different challenges, bossfights and more. Features:
  • Three 'infinite mode' maps
  • Eight different challenges, four easy, four hard.
  • Perk System
  • Highscores
  • Local Kill Counter
More Info: This is a game I made in my free time, it's free, it's fun, it's buggy, I learned a lot while making this game and in the future I will make even better games with knowledge gained from previous ones. Thank you for taking the time to read this, and thank you for playing my game. -Pedromgdo
